page.title: 12The Village Shop, Overton.
page.content: The village shop has to keep many different items, mostly food. At West Overton the following are kept in stock: {Drinks:}soft drinks, alcoholic drinks, fruit juices, tea, coffee. {Dairy Produce: milk, butter, cheese, margarine. {Frozen Foods:}ice cream, cold meat, sausages. {Bread:}loaves, rolls, doughnuts. {Desserts:}yogurt, tinned fruit, cereals, fresh fruit. {Groceries:}eggs, spices, chocolate, biscuits, crisps, vegetables, sugar. {Household:}kitchen rolls, cling film, foil, washing powder, cleaning spray, soap, paint brushes, toilet rolls, first aid, pet food. {Miscellaneous:}DIY products, tights, vegetable seeds, flower seeds, pens, pencils, cards, cigarettes.
